content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with a man named Peter Schmidt from Germany.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of this conversation was the rental price of an apartment in Duisburg.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If no, why didn't you agree on a final price?
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] The landlord, Mr. Schmidt, agreed to a price of 750 Euro per month, but I found it too high and offered 725 Euro per month instead. Mr. Schmidt did not want to continue the negotiation, as we had already agreed on a price, but I did not accept the agreed price.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] The exact number I would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner, Mr. Schmidt, is not provided in the conversation.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] There was no indication in the conversation that the tenant felt discriminated or offended.
name: Haoyu Wang
